function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long queues and crowded stores","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, increased infection rates among retail employees and customers","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, online pre-ordering, and contactless payment options","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, crowd monitoring technology, online ordering systems","People":"Retail employees, customers, general public","Owner":"Retail store management, government authorities"},{"Description":"Emotional stress and strain on retail employees","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being, increased risk of burnout and fatigue among retail employees","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, implement stress-reduction programs and initiatives, encourage open communication and support from management","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, stress-management platforms, communication and feedback tools","People":"Retail employees, store managers, HR departments","Owner":"Store management, HR departments, government authorities"},{"Description":"Abandoned grocery baskets leading to additional work for retail employees","Impact":"Increased workload, strain on resources, potential exposure to contaminated items","Mitigation":"Implement effective queue management, regularly restock abandoned items, provide adequate protective equipment","Technologies":"Queue management systems, automated restocking systems, protective equipment","People":"Retail employees, store managers, customers","Owner":"Store management, government authorities"}]}
